markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with VTC | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Biakara | next = Bounty - Desiwa the Shark | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_VTC_02 | guid = 3ba1dd35-4057-4d23-9a2f-378221c66255 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Aenia has tasked the Watcher with hunting down Veen, a vithrack pirate sailing the dhow Reckless. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * Veen sails his dhow ''[The Reckless](/theReckless/)'' far to the east of Neketaka and past the [Kua o Rikuhu](/kuaORikuhuIslands/) island chain. Find him, kill him, return. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_VTC_02.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Veen''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Aenia has tasked me with hunting down Veen, a vithrack pirate sailing the dhow Reckless. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Veen and take his ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Veen sails his dhow Reckless far to the east of Neketaka and past the Kua o Rikuhu island chain. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Aenia.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Veen's bounty is mine to claim. I can return to Aenia outside of the Vailian Trading Company headquarters at Queen's Berth in Neketaka to collect my reward. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Veen and claimed the reward for his bounty. |- | style="text-align:center" | - | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | |}
